newsitem.title: UK: UK election - Conservatives 0; Labour 5 - 2310 GMT.
newsitem.headline: UK election - Conservatives 0; Labour 5 - 2310 GMT.

text.p: Following is a breakdown of the number of parliamentary seats each party has won so far in Thursday's British election, with four results in from Britain's 659 constituencies -
Average swing to Labour from Conservatives - 9.1 percent.

Exit polls released after polling closed at 2100 GMT - BBC - Conservatives 29 percent, Labour 47 percent, Liberal Democrats 18 percent, others six percent. ITN - Labour predicted to win an overall majority of 159 seats. Conservatives to win 177 seats, Labour 409, Liberal Democrats 45, others 28.
